title: Sonic 3 Trailer Reaction - Blessing & Roger
description:
Blessing and Roger are in Japan but that doesn't stop them from reacting to the Sonic 3 trailer and all of the Nintendo Direct news! 

Get the latest news on advanced PC graphics and RTX gaming! https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/gamescom-2024-nvidia-geforce-announcements/
Head over to Patreon.com/KindaFunny for daily exclusive content!"
FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------  
YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kindafunny/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
